title: Unknown Object
description: Revised edition.Who knew today could be your last. An unknown object impacts in a remote Moroccan town. Nothing prepared us for what happened next. As cities fall, continents shift and the human race struggles to exist, Vivienne Wright must fight her demons as well as the people charged with the very survival of the human race. Can Vivienne’s belief in a young mute woman salvage what’s left of humanity? Do we even deserve to survive? “I am responsible for ending our world. Nothing can save us. When the end comes, believe in the afterlife for there will be nothing left here to believe in. It’s coming. We knew it would. We knew it could not be stopped.”
author: William Soppitt
